t: JM Smucker to divest cookie brand Voortman in $305 mln deal | Reuters
s: October 22, 2024 - J.M. Smucker said on Tuesday it would sell its cookie brand, Voortman, to U.S.-based premium snacks maker Second Name Brands in a $305 million all-cash deal.
